website_summaries.verdict: While it's a bit overpriced, Philips Fidelio SoundRing is one of the better compact AirPlay speakers we've tested -- and it has a battery-powered option to boot.
pros: The Philips Fidelio SoundRing DS3881W is a strikingly designed wireless AirPlay speaker that offers superior sound
It also has a built-in rechargeable battery and a USB port for charging smartphones
cons: The speaker was a little tricky to set up for AirPlay use and the manual could be more clearly written

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: As someone with all of my music in iTunes (and an Apple Music subscriber) Airplay speakers are a must.Much better than Bluetooth, since I can control with my phone, but the music is actually streaming from the computer. This way, my wife and I can each control things, and also come and go, or use our phones for other things without interfering with the music. Multiple speaker setups are supported as well. Now I just wish the Remote App would get an update to work better with Apple Music. We've never had any issues with the wireless connection. We routinely take the speaker up or down one flight from the router, or even out to the deck with no dropouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Larson

customer_reviews.title: Belongs in the Museum of Modern Art (AND it sounds great, to boot)
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be one of the most beautiful examples of industrial design over the past few years. The sound that comes out of this (fairly small) "doughnut" will amaze you. Plus, you can carry it from room to room (it's rechargeable, but you don't have to plug anything in to recharge it!). I haven't used it yet, but I gave one of these to my son, and another to a good friend, and they both love it (as they should). I've heard it at my friend's house, and it sounds every bit as good as it did on the company's website demo video.
customer_reviews.author: Hominid Philosophiae

customer_reviews.title: difficult to connect and music skips
customer_reviews.text: The design on this product seems pretty good, and the audio quality (when it works) is good. That said, there are a lot of very frustrating technical issues. Despite being a simple process, it can be very difficult to get this device to connect to a wireless network, often requiring multiple attempts. Once connected, the device doesn't always appear on my iPhone (it appears more often on iTunes on my MacBook). If I can get it to actually play music, there is a skip every 15 seconds or so. Many of the issues with this product might be due to AirPlay rather than anything Philips is responsible for. Still, the product itself is very frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worst speaker purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Phillips Fidelio originally seemed like a great speaker, in theory, except multi-room pairing with other Airplay enabled speakers is a nightmare!! On top of that, the quality is less than superb:(:( Definitely my worst Amazon purchase yet, as the return policy is absurb charging the return shipping fees PLUS a restocking fee. Lesson learned!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GM15

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, tricky to link it thru router.
customer_reviews.text: I read the instruction and decided to link this devise via router. I was not successful. It was a breeze once I used an I phone to link this devise. The instruction also points out that the software/firmware of the I phone should be 4.3 and up. I have used it for 3 days so far 20-30 min durations in various part of the house and have not had any issues yet. Bottom line it produces good quality sound and its very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Talisman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't hold a signal well. I didn't have it far at all from the google on hub that was broadcasting the signal, and the music would cut out. It was maybe 30 feet. Unacceptable, so I returned it. The seller was great about the return, but I really wish this thing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with the iPhone 4s
customer_reviews.text: This speaker does not work with the iPhone 4s. The native music app on iOS drops the audio for awhile until it finally knocks the speaker off the network somehow. The Phillips app works only slightly better, it drops out, but does not boot the device off the network. It's too bad because the speaker works perfectly on older iOS devices such as the iPad 2. Oh well maybe next time Philips will move faster to fix a bug they've stated they are aware of. I mean how long could it possibly take to patch this thing? #fail
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful aesthetically pleasing design. For a portable device of this type is able to achieve good undistorted volume levels. The added convenience of battery not just plug-in operation is great. Paring with an iPad Air was relatively easy and streaming audio with Apple's less compressed AirPlay format assures better fidelity. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I almost sent this back. It did not arrive in the original packaging. The add didn't say it was a refurbished item. However, I unpacked it and set it up anyway. What an awesome speaker!! At this point, I don't care if it is refurbished or not; I love it. Sounds great for it's size with some tweeking with the iTunes equalizer. And, best of all, it has a built in rechargeable battery. I can walk with it throughout the apartment and not miss a beat. Still a little disappointed that it wasn't in it's original packaging; otherwise, would have given it 5 stars. Other stores are selling it for almost twice the price I paid on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem with the wifi set up on my Apple Airport wifi router. The sound is good, and the size is right for setting on an end table in a living room, den or bedroom. Requires a nearby outlet, so not as suitable for a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Belt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds good (when working), reliable as a Pinto...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous speaker, and I love how it looks, but the functionality leaves me wanting more. When it does work reliably, it's fantastic, but the rest of the time is dreadful. If I'm not incredibly close to the wireless access point, it frequently drops out and doesn't always come back. Wish it was better...
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Don't get sucked into its sexy packaging!
customer_reviews.text: In terms of looks, this is the coolest and sexiest looking speaker on the market! However, many of the reviews are true, and the sound cuts in and out ALL the time. I only used it for 30 minutes before also deciding to return it. There are many better options, at cheaper prices if you're looking for an iPad speaker. What a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: TallManShortWoman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product.
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed in the performance of this speaker. Asthetically it is a work of art, but the music that comes out is tinny and sounds quite awful. I tried different types of music and could not find one type that sounded good. It a same because I really liked the design. Maybe the sound quality is the reason Phillips discontinued this model.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scudder

customer_reviews.title: Frustratingly Glitchy Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product simply doesn't work. It will drop signal and stop playing music. Frequently mine gets stuck in the boot up mode, meaning it will not play music wirelessly or via wire - it's just a blinking paperweight. This can last hours or days and happens constantly. Philips customer service was no use at all. I'm extremely tech savvy and am still unable to make this speaker work. Garbage, don't buy. So bad it has turned me off to any other Philips electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Carl Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and look - for 2 minutes.  Then poof....
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and look. But it worked for 2 minutes then went dead. It would not reboot and could not be reset. Sent back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting from audio source (ipod, ipad, etc ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps disconnecting from audio source (ipod, ipad, etc.) and the streaming service is hit or miss. It's no Sonos. Buy Philips audio products again in the future, not me.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice once you have it set up
customer_reviews.text: From what I have read, using with Apple Airplay is much better than the Phillips software. I have steered clear of the Phillips software and everything works great. The manual isn't super-clear on the setup so if you no aptitude for technology then get someone to help you set this thing up. Once it is set up though, it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Returned it and the replacement was fine. Overall great sound and a really convenient product
customer_reviews.text: When we received it it was obviously a used product. Not properly packaged and scratches on the metal parts. Returned it and the replacement was fine. Overall great sound and a really convenient product. Only the connection via AirPlay could be improved a bit. It works ~90% of the time but sometimes I cannot connect and need to turn it off and on again before I can connect.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Works fine when you connect your phone directly to the unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine when you connect your phone directly to the unit and also is handy to charge your phone. The Airplay function is effectively useless. Constantly drops or clips the music. Do not by it if you want it for Airplay purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions left out a crucial step in making the connection to WiFi. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Duane Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fails, just as reviewed
customer_reviews.text: Despite the negative reviews about drop-outs and difficulties establishing a wi-fi connection, I bought the Soundring anyway, concluding it was worth the risk at the lower price. Well, it was impossible to establish a wi-fi connection (trying both methods described) and with a tenuous connection, experienced the drop-out that several other reviewers. It DID sound great when it worked, but that was ofter enough. I sent it back the next day.
customer_reviews.author: A.H. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air play speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability! It's just great. Connection tends to be great as long as I used my mac as the primary connection. Airplay tends to drop off if I am using the iphone to connect to the speaker for music. As long as I used the remote apps on my iphone to control the itunes on my mac, everything is fine. I wish, apple can improve the connectivity of their air play on their iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lam

customer_reviews.title: Worked, only for a while
customer_reviews.text: Stay away! This speaker may or may not work. When it does its an excellent product. But it may only work intermittently. Called Plilips to have mine repaired, they do not service these or repair them.
customer_reviews.author: shill5739

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to install, it has great sound quality and it looks cool. It is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia Bob

customer_reviews.title: Unique.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, unique and attractive look. Works well with our macbooks and iphone. Only marries to one device at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Onlooker

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It works with my iPad and iPhone and has great sound. I think it was easy to set up (my husband did that part!) and it looks pretty cool on our end table. Nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Marla F

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stops connecting to AirPlay and sound cuts out constantly when playing from iPhone 5S and iPad 2 (both on iOS 8). Philips support was of no help. There doesn't appear to be any software update to the issue.

customer_reviews.title: Good AirPlay Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. It has good sound for something small and portable.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Just like i expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent experience !!! I received everything correctly, the performance and quality of the product is just as I expected !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dario Cabeza

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to all the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Why does Philips continue selling this? Surely it doers more harm to their corporate name than the few dollars they make from this dodgy speaker. Every once in awhile it cuts out. Try listening to music like that. It was so annoying that I had to buy another speaker!
customer_reviews.author: David Knip

customer_reviews.title: looks and sounds good but no wifi
customer_reviews.text: My unit was faulty, the wifi button did nothing, so the unit wouldnt even begin the wifi-setup procedure. if I plugged my iPhone in with a cable it worked fine, but I bought this for the airPlay feature so I returned it (from New Zealand) phillips helpline were incredibly useless and painful to deal with, incapable of listening, no idea how to help, not willing to admit it. Amazon refunded me, but did not cover all return shipping and slapped me with a "Restocking Fee Refund Deduction" leaving me $65 out of pocket. overall a bad experience

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, I would have been pissed if I ...

customer_reviews.title: Good sound nice style.
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers the sound is great for something of its size. The design is very pleasing to the eye. Now I can play the music on my iPhone while in the shower without having my phone in the bath room. The battery could be better.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but...

product_meta.title: Philips DS3881W/37 Fidelio SoundRing Wireless Speaker with AirPlay (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingNatural and immerse sound equally radiates from the center to all directions of your living room. Equipped with AirPlay, these elegant speakers let you stream songs directly from iPod touch, iPhone, iPad and also iTunes. AirPlay lets you stream your entire iTunes music collection to your Fidelio docking stations. It plays wirelessly from the iTunes program on your computer, iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch - to any AirPlay-enabled speaker in your home. All you have to do is ensure your speakers are connected to your Wi-Fi network. AirPlay also lets you play simultaneously on every speaker in every room. Get your favorite tunes to follow you whichever room you go.

AMAZON.COM


Enjoy an immersive sound experience with the Philips Fidelio SoundRing AirPlay speaker. This speaker lets you wirelessly stream music from your iPod touch, iPhone, iPad, or your computer's iTunes library, and uses SoundRing design for crystal-clear, detailed audio. The Fidelio SoundRing is 100% portable and will conveniently play and charge your device simultaneously. It features an aux-in jack for easy hookup to virtually any electronic device. To expand your entertainment options, it works with the free Fidelio app for access to a range of music and other features. The speaker has a built-in lithium-ion battery so you can bring it with you or try out different locations in your home.

PHILIPS FIDELIO SOUNDRING AIRPLAY SPEAKER DS3881W/37
AT A GLANCE:
 * Plays your favorite iTunes songs from your iPod touch, iPhone, iPad, or computer wirelessly
 * Portable, rechargeable unit with built-in lithium-ion battery
 * SoundRing for crystal-clear, immersive audio
 * Compact, 360-degree design
 * Free Fidelio app for access to over 7,000 free Internet radio stations
 * One-year warranty

2012 CES Innovation Award Winner. SoundRing technology delivers full audio impact in all directions for an immersive audio experience. View larger. Convenient portable and wireless design lets you enjoy high-quality sound in any room. View larger. About AirPlay: * Stream your entire iTunes library via your existing wi-fi network
 * Fill any room with rich, balanced sound
 * Compatible with your iPod touch, iPhone, iPad or wi-fi enabled PC or Mac
 * Connect multiple speakers and enjoy music anywhere in your home

Use Apple's free Remote app to access your iTunes library and play your favorite music from your iPod touch, iPhone or iPad.

STREAM MUSIC WITH AIRPLAY WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY
AirPlay technology lets you stream your entire iTunes music collection from the iTunes program on your computer, or your iPod touch, iPhone, or iPad, to the Fidelio SoundRing AirPlay speaker using your existing Wi-Fi connection. AirPlay also lets you enjoy enhanced sound from games, music-making apps, YouTube videos, Internet TV, and iTunes movies. 

Whether you're hosting a party or simply want to enjoy a full-on sound experience, this technology will play sound simultaneously on every AirPlay-enabled speaker in every room so rich, full sound can fill your home. 

SOUNDRING FOR CRYSTAL-CLEAR, IMMERSIVE SOUND
Experience your favorite songs like you never have before with the Fidelio SoundRing. This speaker features SoundRing technology, which is engineered to completely fill your room with superb sound. A central bass sound pipe and four high-definition drivers--two front-firing and two side-firing--work together to provide an immersive sound experience with full audio impact in all directions. 

SIMULTANEOUS PLAYING AND CHARGING
The Fidelio SoundRing offers the convenience of both corded and cordless operation so you can enjoy your music anytime, anywhere. When you connect your iPod touch, iPhone, or iPad via the USB port, you can play music while also charging your device. An aux-in jack makes for easy connection to virtually any electronic device, including MP3 players and stereo components. 

COMPACT, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN
Take your music wherever you want thanks to the compact, 360-degree design and built-in rechargeable battery. Charge the speaker on its sleek charging base to enjoy up to three hours of music in AirPlay mode, or up to six hours via the aux-in or USB port. Unlike bulky speakers that can take over your space, the Fidelio SoundRing is compact and easy to move around, and looks stylish from any angle on a bookshelf, nightstand, or side table. 

FREE FIDELIO APP FOR MUSIC, ALARM AND OTHER FUN FEATURES
If you own an iPod touch, iPhone, or iPad, you can unlock even more features for this wireless speaker using the complementary Fidelio app. The Philips Fidelio app gives you access to over 7,000 free Internet radio stations. It also lets you share your favorite music with friends via Facebook and Twitter, set customized alarms to wake up to your favorite music, and enjoy detailed weather reports. 

COMPATIBILITY INFORMATION
The Fidelio SoundRing is compatible with iPod touch; iPod touch 2nd, 3rd, and 4th generation; iPhone; iPhone 3G, 3GS, and 4; iPad, and iPad 2nd generation. The Fidelio app requires a Fidelio speaker and iPod touch, iPhone, or iPad iOS 4.3 or later. 

DIMENSIONS AND WARRANTY
The Fidelio SoundRing measures 8.3 by 7.75 by 4.5 inches (H x W x D) and is backed by a one-year warranty. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Philips Fidelio SoundRing AirPlay speaker DS3881W/37, 3.5-millimeter aux-in cable, AC adapter, charging base, CD-ROM user manual, warranty information, and quick start guide.
